item.title: Making your own VS Code theme
item.description: Visual Studio Code has become prolific in the tech community as the text editor of choice for many. One of the many reasons for that is the sheer amount of customisability it offers.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: console.log('Hello World!') Well as every person in tech eventually does I’m starting to blog. Now this isn’t actually the first blog I have made, my true fans may remember my initial, ill-fated attempt, Just Another Hacker Blog.
